With a little guidance, journeys become a breeze. We simplify your investments by understanding your needs and handpicking mutual funds to help achieve your goals.

Active Trading

You need direct market access and tools to spot trade opportunities as they happen. Our suite of advanced features is designed to deliver exactly that.

Get on our platform now

Products & Services

You’re different and so made a unique mix of products and services to go with it. Whether you’re starting off or are a seasoned investor, we’ve got everything you need to stay on the ball.

  • Products
  • Services
  • Value added Services
  • Platforms

Products

Equity

Invest in a long-term perspective while keeping up with daily ups and downs. It’s like your first line of defence from inflation, while bumping up your purchasing power.

Mutual Fund

Invest in the finest India equities even when you don’t have the time or skill to handpick high-performing stocks. Best of both worlds? Totally possible.

Derivatives

Get on the Indian growth story train with Derivatives. Boost your returns from equities by providing leverage through products like F&O.

ETF

The world is your playground with Exchange Traded Funds. Invest in various country indices, participate in profits of global brands or tap into sectors not available in India.

Insurance

The world is your playground with Exchange Traded Funds. Invest in various country indices, participate in profits of global brands or tap into sectors not available in India.

Debt/Fixed Income

Make the most of debt/fixed instruments - long term securities which give a fixed rate of interest and are issued by some companies.

Currency

Deep dive into the largest and most liquid financial market. Trade in currencies to make the most of advanced technology and increased globalization.

Commodity

Who said you need to store commodity to buy or sell Trade smart in commodities based on timings of key global commodity exchanges. More time, more trade.

IPO

Begin your trading journey from the start – of a Company. Make an informed investment choice and grab the opportunity to get a stock at the lowest possible price

Services

TIN-FC

Tax Information Network simplifies the current system for collection, processing, monitoring and accounting of direct taxes using IT. In short, tax woes made simpler.s

NPS

Financial planning is simple logic. For instance, the National Pension Scheme helps you make systematic savings when you’re healthy and working, so you can enjoy a comfortable retirement.

Aadhar

We are a Government-empanelled enrolment agency, which means you can walk in to one of our centres near you and get your Aadhar card.

DSC

You’re unique and your DSC agrees. Digital Signature Certificates is the electronic format of physical certificate to prove your identity and sign documents digitally.

Demat and Trading Account

Design your account your way. Pick demat that lets you hold your shares in an electronic form. Or choose trading, an online platform to buy and sell securities, bonds and more.

Value added Services

Terminal View

Imagine features of a trading software so smoothly bundled on a web platform, that you get a terminal-type experience on your browser. Don’t imagine anymore.

Trader Watchlist

Watch where want to go, a little bit more closely – with a wider range of tools that let you access more data than ever.

Alerts and Notifications

Markets on your mind? Never mind. Select the notifications you want, know your portfolio gain and set price alerts on your favourite scrip in a jiffy.

Platforms

Web

We have mixed the responsiveness of a trading terminal with the offerings of the web, to create a pro platform. Caution – it could change the way you trade.

Mobile Max

Moving markets keep you on your toes? Your turn to get them on your fingertips with a one-of-a-kind mobile platform. Track, trade and transact in a snap.

Desktop Pro

If one thing can take you ahead of the market curve, its speed. So this terminal-type desktop software is designed for critical action and is hard-wired to keep up with you.

Attention Investor

Prevent unauthorized transactions in your account - Update your mobile numbers/email IDs with your stock brokers. Receive information of your transactions directly from Exchange on your mobile/email at the end of the day - Issued in the interest of Investors.

Prevent Unauthorized Transactions in your demat account Update your Mobile Number with your Depository Participant. Receive alerts on your Registered Mobile for all debit and other important transactions in your demat account directly from Depository (NSDL/CDSL) on the same day issued in the interest of investors.

No need to issue cheques by investors while subscribing to IPO. Just write the bank account number and sign in the application form to authorise your bank to make payment in case of allotment. No worries for refund as the money remains in investors account.

KYC is one time exercise while dealing in securities markets - once KYC is done through a SEBI registered intermediary (broker, DP, Mutual Fund etc.), you need not undergo the same process again when you approach another intermediary. ye text Attention Investor ke accordion mein daal de... footer mein
